name: Blockels
description:
Welcome to Nepcube! The home of the Blockels.

This game is about co-operating with your Blockle brethren across 4 different tribes. They all have different abilities and you need to run jump and stack your way to the goal of every level.

Hey all! 

So this is my first game, I hope you like it.  I've set this first version up with 11 levels and have put 2 of the 4 playable characters in those first levels. I have already created the 2 other playable characters of a Ninja (faster movement and double jump) and a Flying blockle  (can fly anywhere on the level but cant land). I'm planning on making 100 levels for this in total so I have a fair way to go but wanted to get something out in the world. I'd love to hear what you all think of it and am really interested to hear any feedback.

I have used the awesome tileset and backgrounds from

https://kasianov-maksim.itch.io/pixel-adventure

and the four seasons tileset from

https://rottingpixels.itch.io/four-seasons-platformer-tileset-16x16free

The rest is custom artwork and i've made all the music, FX and voices myself.

The game supports keyboard and controller.

Controls for Keyboard:

Up (menu) - W

Down (menu) - S

Left - A

Right - D

Switch Player Left - E

Switch Player Right - R

Jump - Space

Next Dialog - N

Select - Enter

ESC - Pause

And Controller:

Movement and menu - D-Pad

Camera Movement - Right Analog

Jump / Select / Dialog Next - A/X

Switch Player Left - LT

Switch Player Right - RT

Select / Pause - Enter
